### AI Trends Summary

The articles provide insights into various aspects of Large Language Models (LLMs), covering how updates to these models are managed to improve performance and accuracy, and discussing the phenomenon of LLM hallucination, where models generate false or nonsensical information. The significance of the attention mechanism is highlighted as a crucial factor for enhancing LLM performance by better focusing on relevant parts of the input data. Furthermore, the role of prompt engineering in directing LLM output towards more accurate and useful responses is examined. Lastly, a significant development by OpenAI is presented as a game-changing event in the field, although specific details of the change are not provided in the summary.

tech_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-03

### Top Stories

1. [Kimi Linear: An Expressive, Efficient Attention Architecture](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.26692)

2. ['No idea who he is', says Trump after pardoning crypto tycoon](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cn7ek63e5xyo)

3. [ECL Runs Maxima in a Browser](https://mailman3.common-lisp.net/hyperkitty/list/ecl-devel@common-lisp.net/thread/T64S5EMVV6WHDPKWZ3AQHEPO3EQE2K5M/)

4. [State of Terminal Emulators in 2025](https://www.jeffquast.com/post/state-of-terminal-emulation-2025/)

5. [Modern Python CI with Coverage in 2025](https://danielnouri.org/notes/2025/11/03/modern-python-ci-with-coverage-in-2025/)

6. [Python 3.14 added support for max-heaps](https://docs.python.org/3/whatsnew/3.14.html)

7. [From Signals to Reliability: SLOs, Runbooks and Post-Mortems](https://fatihkoc.net/posts/sre-observability-slo-runbooks/)

8. [Google's Jeff Dean on the Coming Era of Virtual Engineers](https://sequoiacap.com/podcast/training-data-jeff-dean/)

9. [Variation Is King, Not the Average](https://xmrit.com/articles/variation-is-king-not-the-average)

10. [Show HN: 1D Pac-Man running on my custom ARM-like fantasy console in the browser](https://github.com/beep8/beep8-sdk)

### Summary

1. Kimi Linear introduces a new attention architecture that enhances expressiveness and efficiency in machine learning models, offering a significant leap in processing complex datasets.
2. Former President Trump pardoned a notable figure in the cryptocurrency world, despite publicly stating he has no knowledge of the individual's identity, highlighting the unpredictable nature of presidential pardons.
3. ECL Runs Maxima in a Browser represents an advancement in computational software, allowing users to run the Maxima computer algebra system directly in a web browser, facilitating more accessible and versatile mathematical computations.
4. The state of terminal emulators in 2025 indicates significant progress in user interface and functionality, with advancements aimed at increasing productivity and integration with modern development tools.
5. Modern Python CI with Coverage in 2025 showcases the evolution of Continuous Integration (CI) practices for Python, emphasizing the importance of code coverage and the adoption of cutting-edge technologies to ensure high-quality software development.
